com.rockhoppertech.music.scale

Class ScaleTrackBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.scale.ScaleTrackBuilder

  • public class ScaleTrackBuilder
extends Object
    Create a MIDITrack from a Scale.

    Maybe this should just be rolled into the track builder. But, the track you get is a scale, so the names fits. It's a scale and not a Scale. 

     MIDITrack track = ScaleBuilder.create()
      .name("Major")
      .root(Pitch.C5)
      .track()
      .sequential();
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ScaleTrackBuilder create()
        Should be the first call. Creates an instance of the builder.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        public MIDITrack build()
        Final call in the chain to build the track. You set either the scale name, or the intervals. The preference if you set both is to use the scale name.
        Returns:
        a new MIDITrack
